title: 02/18/22 DPS Best Of -  Doug Gottlieb and Jason Smith Guest Hosts
itunes:title: 02/18/22 DPS Best Of -  Doug Gottlieb and Jason Smith Guest Hosts
description:
Doug and Jason discuss the Rams' championship week and the storylines that have unfolded since L.A. won the Super Bowl, including the unfortunate incident with the Staffords and a photographer who was injured in a fall.

Former NBA player Eddie House joins the guys to talk about the Lakers' situation with the latest Anthony Davis injury, who is the MVP right now in the league, and a look at the NBA Eastern conference and how it shakes out.

Doug and Jason debate whether or not Aaron Rodgers will continue to play and with what team.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
